headline: Regency Centers to Present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regency Centers Corporation (“Regency Centers” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: REG) today announced that the Company’s management team is scheduled to present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference (the “Conference”) on Tuesday, September 9, 2025, at 2:15 pm ET. To access the Company’s live presentation, use the webcast registration link below. Regency Centers PresentationDate:Tuesday, September 9, 2025Time:2:15 p.m. – 2:50 p.m
